title: Video Card Video Driver
body:
Hey all, I've recently got my computer cleaned of viruses but when I tried to play LoL, just before the loading screen I get:

An unknown DirectX error has occurred and League of Legends cannot start. Please make sure your video card is using the latest video drivers from the manufacturer

Please help me with this as I have downloaded all the latest video drivers and it is completely up to date. I have gotten one of the technicians from the place it was cleaned to fix it. He said that it has to be something in LoL.

replies.body:
>I've recently got my computer cleaned of viruses

That's not a really good start. You're best off formatting your hard-drive and reinstalling your OS. By the way, which OS are you running on anyway?

Please open up dxdiag and tell me what version of DirectX it claims you to have. If you don't know how to do that, read [this](http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/which-version-directx).

Of course you can always download the latest version of DirectX from [here](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=35) and install it manually.

Best of luck.

It says that its version: 10.18.14.4156
I have also manually downloaded the latest version or DirectX and it is still not working. But don't worry I am taking it back to the place that 'fixed' it and demand them to repair or replace it.

Solid move, do tell how that turns out for ya. They might actually replace the hard-drive if you're lucky, free of charge.

Best of luck.
